title: Mastery 6 Token
body: My last game I got an S on Urgot and got mastery 5 with the points for that game. The banner came up to say that I received a mastery 6 token for him, but  there are no tokens for Urgot in my crafting inventory.

replies.body: Rinney's information is spot on!  Upon reaching level 5, the notification you received is actually a splash that gives the how-to on earning level 6 tokens.  These details and more are also provided in the [Champion Mastery Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5)  Congratulations on earning an S with Urgot as well as level 5!
I've seen the issue reported numerous times. Either it is showing the wrong message, or it is absurdly misleading. Either way it should definately be looked at.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9YAbvx5l,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-07T23:34:48.350+0000)
>
> I've seen the issue reported numerous times. Either it is showing the wrong message, or it is absurdly misleading. Either way it should definately be looked at.

Message received!  We've received feedback on this, and it's already been forwarded onward.

If you achieved level 5 in the game you got an S you wouldn't receive a token. You need to be at level 5 prior to achieving an S to receive tokens.

(Credits to Deep Terror Nami for enlightening me on this)

Same, this happened to me.  At first I was like, oh cool I got lvl 5 and an token for an S... but then I saw I only got an A.  Was very confused.

~David
